title: The BCBR Gravel Explorer Recap Video
content: The BC Bike Race is an epic MTB adventure, taking entrants into the remote backcountry, and this year, the BCBR hosted a Gravel Explorer event, taking gravel cyclists into the South Okanagan, which provided the perfect canvas to re-imagine what a gravel bike is truly capable ofâ€¦ enjoy this recap video from the event.
author: prolly
